```{r setup}
library(Bowser)
```

```{r}
mask_dat = system.file("extdata", "lung_template_mask.nii.gz", package = "Bowser")
background_dat = system.file("extdata", "lung_template_meanHU.nii.gz", package = "Bowser")

dat<- getSimData(mask = mask_dat,
           background.img = background_dat,
           location = c(26,16),
           K = 1,
           size = 3,
           int = 300,
           set.seed = 1)
```

```{r}
image(dat)
```
